title.narrative: POLICY AND ADMINISTRATIVE LAW

description.narrative: For Policy and Administrative law, throughout 2014-2017 and within available resources, DHR and the OneHR global community provide quality support to UNICEF leaders for successful management of change and risk at global and office levels, which contributes to Corporate Human Resources Management, Human Resources Management. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Management of the HR Function

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House 3 United Nations Plaza New York New York 10017 USA

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Human resources management capacity at HQ
